description: Add 'Drafts' tab to Contracts management page (third tab after Templates and Client Contracts)
Drafts tab shows count badge indicating number of draft contracts
Create getDraftContracts action to fetch all draft contracts for tenant
Drafts DataTable displays contract name column
Drafts DataTable displays client name column
Drafts DataTable displays created date column
Drafts DataTable displays last modified date column
Drafts DataTable displays actions dropdown column with Resume and Discard options
Drafts list supports sorting by columns (default: last modified descending)
Drafts list supports search/filter by contract name
Drafts list supports search/filter by client name
Drafts list uses existing pagination patterns
Drafts list shows empty state when no drafts exist
Create getDraftContractForResume action to fetch complete draft data for wizard
Resume action opens ContractWizard dialog with draft data pre-populated
Resumed wizard starts at Step 1 (Contract Basics)
All wizard steps pre-populate with saved draft data when resuming
Save Draft in resumed wizard updates the existing draft (not creates new)
Completing wizard from resumed draft activates contract (status changes from draft to active)
Discard action shows confirmation dialog with contract name and client name
Confirmation dialog has Cancel and Discard buttons
Confirming discard deletes the draft contract using existing deleteContract action
Drafts list refreshes after successful deletion
All draft queries filter by tenant for multi-tenant isolation
Drafts functionality respects existing contract permissions (create, delete)
